narrative.asA: guy who wants to win a bet with cameron
narrative.iWantTo: ensure files are ingested and processed in the manner in which the methods in the ingest class purport to process them.

scenario.title: Simple test to give JBehave a test drive1
scenario.step: When the caller loads the file as a byte array
Then the byte array that is returned contains the correct number of bytes.
